docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A NEW law that gives New Jersey workers the right to take time off to care for a newborn baby or sick family member could bring about sweeping changes in relations between employers and employees, business organizations and families, leave advocates say.

headline.main: Family Leave: Wide Effects Are Seen For Employers
